title: Manage Equipment Lubrication Schedule
description: A maintenance technician performs scheduled lubrication tasks on fixed plant equipment.

tasks.description: Receive a list of scheduled lubrication tasks for the day on a mobile device.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician has a clear list of all required lubrication jobs for their shift.

tasks.description: Go to each piece of equipment, identify the correct lubrication points, and apply the specified type and amount of grease.
tasks.expected_outcome: All equipment on the list is lubricated correctly.

tasks.description: Mark each task as complete in the mobile app, which updates the equipment's maintenance history in the CMMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: All tasks are completed, and the CMMS is updated in real-time.
